languages.text: Вольный Торговец заключил союз с Комиссаром. Для успешного побега из Комморры им предстоит расправиться с ксеносом Злобой, из логова которого и начнется их путь спасения.

The Rogue Trader has formed an alliance with the Commissar. To successfully escape Commorragh, they will need to eliminate the xenos called Malice. Securing Malice's lair will be the first stepping stone to freedom.
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец заключил союз с Комиссаром. Для успешного побега из Комморры им предстоит расправиться с ксеносом Злобой, из логова которого и начнется их путь спасения.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader has formed an alliance with the Commissar. To successfully escape Commorragh they'll need to eliminate the xenos called Malice. Securing Malice's lair will be the first stepping stone to freedom.

The Rogue Trader has formed an alliance with the Commissar. To successfully escape Commorragh, they will need to eliminate the xenos called Malice. Securing Malice's lair will be the first stepping stone to freedom.

The Rogue Trader has formed an alliance with the Commissar. To successfully escape Commorragh, they will need to eliminate the xenos called Malice. Securing Malice's lair will be the first stepping stone to freedom.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a formé une alliance avec le commissaire. Pour réussir à s'échapper de Commorragh, ils doivent éliminer un certain Malice. Le premier pas vers la liberté consistera à sécuriser le repaire de ce xénos.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has formed an alliance with the Commissar. To successfully escape Commorragh, they will need to eliminate the xenos called Malice. Securing Malice's lair will be the first stepping stone to freedom.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a formé une alliance avec le commissaire. Pour réussir à s'échapper de Commorragh, ils doivent éliminer un certain Malice. Le premier pas vers la liberté consistera à sécuriser le repaire de ce xénos.

languages.text: 行商浪人与政委结成了联盟。为了顺利逃出科摩罗，他们需要先消灭那个叫做“恶棍”的异形。夺取恶棍的巢穴，将会是重获自由的第一步。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has formed an alliance with the Commissar. To successfully escape Commorragh, they will need to eliminate the xenos called Malice. Securing Malice's lair will be the first stepping stone to freedom.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人与政委结成了联盟。为了顺利逃出科摩罗，他们需要先消灭那个叫做“恶棍”的异形。夺取恶棍的巢穴，将会是重获自由的第一步。

languages.text: 自由開拓者はコミッサーと同盟を組んだ。コモラフを脱出するには、マリスと呼ばれている異種族を排除する必要がある。マリスの隠れ家を確保するとが、自由への第一歩だ。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has formed an alliance with the Commissar. To successfully escape Commorragh, they will need to eliminate the xenos called Malice. Securing Malice's lair will be the first stepping stone to freedom.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者はコミッサーと同盟を組んだ。コモラフを脱出するには、マリスと呼ばれている異種族を排除する必要がある。マリスの隠れ家を確保するとが、自由への第一歩だ。

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} ist ein Bündnis mit dem Kommissar eingegangen. Um erfolgreich aus Commorragh zu entkommen, müssen sie den Xenos namens Tücke eliminieren. Tückes Versteck zu sichern, ist der erste Schritt Richtung Freiheit.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has formed an alliance with the Commissar. To successfully escape Commorragh, they will need to eliminate the xenos called Malice. Securing Malice's lair will be the first stepping stone to freedom.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} ist ein Bündnis mit dem Kommissar eingegangen. Um erfolgreich aus Commorragh zu entkommen, müssen sie den Xenos namens Tücke eliminieren. Tückes Versteck zu sichern, ist der erste Schritt Richtung Freiheit.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha formado una alianza con el comisario. Para escapar de Commorragh deberán eliminar al xenos llamado Malicia. Asegurar la guarida de Malicia será el primer paso hacia la libertad.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has formed an alliance with the Commissar. To successfully escape Commorragh, they will need to eliminate the xenos called Malice. Securing Malice's lair will be the first stepping stone to freedom.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha formado una alianza con el comisario. Para escapar de Commorragh deberán eliminar al xenos llamado Malicia. Asegurar la guarida de Malicia será el primer paso hacia la libertad.

languages.text: Hür Tacir, Komiser'le ittifak kurdu. Commorragh'tan kaçabilmek için Melanet adındaki zenoyu öldürmeleri gerekecek. Melanet'in inini ele geçirmek, özgürlüğe uzanan basamaklardan ilki olacak.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has formed an alliance with the Commissar. To successfully escape Commorragh, they will need to eliminate the xenos called Malice. Securing Malice's lair will be the first stepping stone to freedom.
